actors.name: text1
actors.text: Can you decide if an activity is physical or sitting still?

args.name: text2
args.text: Is this a physical or a sitting-still activity?

args.name: correct-answer
args.text: Walking the dog is a physical activity.

actors.name: text
actors.text: Is this a physical or a sitting-still activity?

args.name: correct-answer
args.text: Using the computer is a sitting-still activity.

actors.name: text-line2
actors.text: No more than two hours of sitting-still activities a day

actors.name: text-line3
actors.text: At least one hour of physical activity a day

actors.name: text-line2
actors.text: Click to hear what your friends do!
